intension: Create a travel tour offer card advertising European vacations. The design should showcase popular European destinations and architecture. Encourage customers to consult with a specialized travel agent by promoting the website www.firmname.com. Include the company logo.
globalcaption: The image features a man standing on a street, wearing a hat and a backpack. He appears to be a traveler, possibly on a European vacation. The man is positioned in the center of the scene, with a few other people visible in the background.\n\nThere are several birds in the image, with one near the top left corner, another in the middle of the scene, and the third one towards the right side. The presence of these birds adds a lively atmosphere to the scene.
keywords: travel, vacation, summer, tourism, journey, trip, adventure, tour, leisure, voyage, travelling, destination, man, europe, architecture, street, card

bglayer.bgcaption: The image features a white background with a small square cut out, revealing a beautiful view of a city skyline. The cityscape is filled with various buildings, including a prominent clock tower. The buildings are situated on a hill, creating a picturesque scene. The cut out square allows the viewer to focus on the city's architecture and the clock tower, making it a captivating and visually appealing image

objlayer.objcaption: The image features a man standing on a sidewalk, wearing a hat and a backpack. He is holding a camera in his hands, possibly taking a picture or preparing to capture a moment. The man appears to be enjoying his time outdoors, possibly on a vacation or a trip.\n\nIn the background, there are several birds flying in the sky, adding a lively touch to the scene. The man is also wearing a backpack, which suggests that he might be carrying essential items for his journey or outing
